title: Remove Posters page and ensure publish/redeploy succeeds

requirements.text: Delete the Posters page from the website completely by removing its route and all navigation links to it, and remove the Posters page implementation so it is no longer part of the frontend build.

quotes: remove the posters page from the website..

acceptanceCriteria: The app no longer registers a route at `/posters` (attempting to navigate to `/posters` does not render the Posters page).
The primary site navigation no longer includes a 'Posters' link in either desktop or mobile menus.
The frontend builds successfully with no unused-import/module-not-found errors related to the removed Posters page.

requirements.text: Resolve the publish/republish failure so the project can be published successfully without the platform error message.
acceptanceCriteria: A publish/redeploy run completes successfully without showing the error message 'AI was unable to complete your request'.
The deployed application loads and routes work as expected after publishing.

constraints: Do not modify any files under `frontend/src/components/ui`.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in `backend/main.mo`; only add/modify `backend/migration.mo` if a state upgrade is required (not expected for removing a frontend page).
nonGoals: Do not add new pages or new navigation items unrelated to removing the Posters page.
Do not change poster/profile backend APIs or data model unless required to fix the publish failure.
Do not implement third-party authentication or external services.
